mapper.select: SELECT id, last_name, user_name, xm_role.roleid, xm_role.rolename, xm_groups.groupid, xm_groups.groupname, `status`, is_admin, email1, phone_work FROM xm_users LEFT JOIN xm_user2role ON xm_user2role.userid = xm_users.id LEFT JOIN xm_role ON xm_role.roleid = xm_user2role.roleid LEFT JOIN xm_users2group ON xm_users2group.userid = xm_users.id LEFT JOIN xm_groups ON xm_groups.groupid = xm_users2group.groupid WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY last_name ASC limit #{start},#{rows}

SELECT count(id) FROM xm_users LEFT JOIN xm_user2role ON xm_user2role.userid = xm_users.id LEFT JOIN xm_role ON xm_role.roleid = xm_user2role.roleid LEFT JOIN xm_users2group ON xm_users2group.userid = xm_users.id LEFT JOIN xm_groups ON xm_groups.groupid = xm_users2group.groupid WHERE deleted = 0
select * from xm_users where deleted=0 and status='Active' order by prefix;
